interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Defying Gravity: Season 1 Review Date: 2010/05/28 Store: Livingston, Ron (Actor), Airlie, Andrew (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Fox TV, General Product Description: ['Set in the very near future, eight astronauts from five countries undertake a mysterious six-year international mission on the spaceship Antares. This sexy and provocative sci fi thriller follows 4 men and 4 women through the solar system where their pasts reveal intimate and interconnected secrets that have a strange effect on the present and mysteries yet to be revealed. DVD includes 5 episodes never seen on television.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Yoba, Malik, Airlie, Andrew, Livingston, Ron', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '9 hours and 20 minutes', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '109899521990', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '9 hours and 20 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 19, 2010', 'Actors': 'Livingston, Ron, Airlie, Andrew, Yoba, Malik', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Number of discs': '4'} Review Text: Good series, better on DVD w/o dumb commercials to interrupt.

Want show brought back!! Review Title: Good series, better on DVD Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Strong interest in sci-fi and character-driven series that blend drama with intriguing plots and interpersonal relationships.
- **Format Preference:** Favors DVD or box set formats for viewing, emphasizing the importance of an uninterrupted experience without commercials.
- **Quality Seeking:** Values high-quality production and storytelling, as evidenced by a good rating for engaging series.
- **Nostalgic Interest:** Shows a desire for ongoing connection to past favorites, indicating a preference for series that may have been discontinued or ended.
- **Engagement Style:** Engages actively by reviewing and expressing opinions on content, suggesting thoughtful consumption and an acute awareness of media quality.

Overall, this user exhibits a distinct affinity for immersive TV experiences, with an inclination towards the sci-fi genre and appreciation for complete series presentations.
